Description: Lamp (incomplete). Made of turquoise glazed pottery, all 6 spouts broken and 1 handle missing.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Cairo (city), OA register: "Said to have come from a Coptic church on the outskirts of Cairo".
Curator's comments: Cf. R. Mason & J. Tugwell, 'Fatimid Tall-Necked Lamps and Their Associates: A Typology', Journal of the American Research Center in Egypt 47 (2011) 335-53, esp. 347-52 (Group Two).
